channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-23612] SELECT ROUND(CAST(1.2345 AS FLOAT), 1) cannot compile
item.description:
Run this SQL SELECT ROUND(CAST(1.2345 AS FLOAT), 1) and the following exception will be thrown:

java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not instantiate generated class 'ExpressionReducer$2'

item.summary: SELECT ROUND(CAST(1.2345 AS FLOAT), 1) cannot compile

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This is because Calcite hasn't implemented the sround function for float. There is also no implementation for byte and short. I'm taking this issue.
